channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 07:36 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 07:36 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukranian Air Monitoring System, and may indicate a potential or immiment air-based attack or other threat.
